name: The Fish Out of Water
description: You don't belong here. You may have passed the training, but you suspect there was some sort of mistake because you are so clearly not suited for this. You have some sort of expertise that is useful, but it doesn't justify your presence in an elite exploration team representing your planet.

moves.name: Lucky bastard
moves.description: You regain a Luck point every time you get 10+ on a roll

moves.name: Pitiful
moves.description: Bad guys feel bad attacking you, so they prefer to target your allies instead

moves.name: Is this important?
moves.description: When other explorers are investigating, you stumble into something important, but misidentify it

moves.name: Behind you!
moves.description: When an ally is protecting you, you help them by calling out the locations of bad guys (+1 help out while being protected)

moves.name: I've got a bad feeling about this
moves.description: Mark experience any time you get 10+ on read a bad situation rolls

moves.name: Time to shine
moves.description: Whenever you are separated from the group, you get +1 to all rolls

moves.name: Underdog
moves.description: Once per mission, get an automatic 12 on a kick some ass roll

items.name: Camouflage
tags: hide in the woods if things get too real
